about_the_game:
Dive into the mesmerizing world of real-time graphics with our innovative visualization laboratory. Export stunning visualizations, and make your own art with ease. Whether you're a curious newcomer, or a seasoned shader artist, our application offers a user-friendly platform for viewing, experimenting, and immersing yourself in the captivating world of shader-based visualizations. This is the ultimate playground for enthusiasts, and artists alike.

v1.0 Features:

  • Playlist and Timeline Features: Create, manage, and enjoy shader playlists with advanced timeline features. Curate your own collections of shaders, set the mood, and immerse yourself in a continuous visual journey.
  • Music Responsiveness: Elevate your shader experience with music responsiveness. Many of our shaders are designed to dance to the rhythm of your favorite tunes, providing a unique and mesmerizing audiovisual experience.
  • Infinite Exploration: Our vast library of shaders offers an endless array of creative possibilities. Explore, tweak, and experiment with a wide range of shaders to create your unique visual masterpieces.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive and user-friendly interface ensures that both beginners and experienced shader artists can dive right in, with no technical expertise required.
  • Share and Collaborate: With Steam Workshop support you can share your shader playlists with friends, and collaborate on creative projects, all within the application. Explore the work of other artists and discover new shaders to inspire your own creations.
  • Community-Driven: Join a thriving community of shader artists and enthusiasts. Share your work, get feedback, and stay updated on the latest shader trends.
  • ShaderToy Compatibility: Experience the magic of ShaderToy right from your desktop. Our tool is fully compatible with ShaderToy shaders, opening the door to a vast library of visually stunning and interactive art.

Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of shaders, where art, technology, and interactivity blend seamlessly. With our shader visualization laboratory, the possibilities are limitless, and the visuals are breath-taking. Start your journey today and become a part of a vibrant and creative community.

Explore, experiment, and experience shaders like never before. Your imagination is the only limit!
detailed_description:
Dive into the mesmerizing world of real-time graphics with our innovative visualization laboratory. Export stunning visualizations, and make your own art with ease. Whether you're a curious newcomer, or a seasoned shader artist, our application offers a user-friendly platform for viewing, experimenting, and immersing yourself in the captivating world of shader-based visualizations. This is the ultimate playground for enthusiasts, and artists alike.

v1.0 Features:

  • Playlist and Timeline Features: Create, manage, and enjoy shader playlists with advanced timeline features. Curate your own collections of shaders, set the mood, and immerse yourself in a continuous visual journey.
  • Music Responsiveness: Elevate your shader experience with music responsiveness. Many of our shaders are designed to dance to the rhythm of your favorite tunes, providing a unique and mesmerizing audiovisual experience.
  • Infinite Exploration: Our vast library of shaders offers an endless array of creative possibilities. Explore, tweak, and experiment with a wide range of shaders to create your unique visual masterpieces.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive and user-friendly interface ensures that both beginners and experienced shader artists can dive right in, with no technical expertise required.
  • Share and Collaborate: With Steam Workshop support you can share your shader playlists with friends, and collaborate on creative projects, all within the application. Explore the work of other artists and discover new shaders to inspire your own creations.
  • Community-Driven: Join a thriving community of shader artists and enthusiasts. Share your work, get feedback, and stay updated on the latest shader trends.
  • ShaderToy Compatibility: Experience the magic of ShaderToy right from your desktop. Our tool is fully compatible with ShaderToy shaders, opening the door to a vast library of visually stunning and interactive art.

Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of shaders, where art, technology, and interactivity blend seamlessly. With our shader visualization laboratory, the possibilities are limitless, and the visuals are breath-taking. Start your journey today and become a part of a vibrant and creative community.

Explore, experiment, and experience shaders like never before. Your imagination is the only limit!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes (OpenGL ES 2.0 required)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes (OpenGL ES 2.0 required)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ventura 13.0.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes (OpenGL 3.3 required)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: VizLab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes (OpenGL ES 2.0 required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
